title: It couldn't happen
brief_description: Burns are one of the most frequent types of domestic accidents, particularly to children. The variety of situations in which accidental burning can happen are explored, the elements that are involved and how they can be minimised. In particular, it details the importance of the material in, and the design of children’s clothes.
